price: 74. Hubaal denbiilayaashu waxay geli  cadaabka Naarta iyagoo ku waadhi.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
